description:
Structure the application as a modular monolith with clear module boundaries and APIs, where each module (e.g., Documents, Relationships, AI) can communicate only through defined interfaces, preparing for potential future microservices extraction.

**Rationale:** This provides microservices benefits (modularity, clear boundaries, independent testing) without operational complexity. It enables gradual evolution to distributed architecture if needed while maintaining current deployment simplicity and avoiding premature distribution.
title: Build a Modular Monolith with Internal Service Boundaries
